ack.p: We wish to thank the long term assistance of the National Bison Range staff. Field work was assisted by more than 70 individuals, but special attention should be given to L. Asher-Fuchs, D. Branson, J. Chase, R.R. Garcia, K. Haynes, D. Hoekman, M. Kerschner, A.N. Laws, E. Laws, K. Lee, J. Moorehead, N. Payne, J. Richter, M. Ritchie, O. Schmitz, D. Shetrone, S. Szabo, T. Tapscott, F. Wolz, and J.B. Wright.
